languages.text: {n}Изумрудные глаза провидца полны отчаяния.{/n} "Мы вели Крударах по пути, что пророчили сами звезды, пока бурные течения Ша'эиль не забросили нас к краю Великой Раны. Буря надвигалась, грозясь смести Крударах со своего пути, и потому совет избрал путь к спасению — через ближайший островок надежды в место, что мон-кай зовут Простором Коронус".

traits.locale_text: {n}Изумрудные глаза провидца полны отчаяния.{/n} "Мы вели Крударах по пути, что пророчили сами звезды, пока бурные течения Ша'эиль не забросили нас к краю Великой Раны. Буря надвигалась, грозясь смести Крударах со своего пути, и потому совет избрал путь к спасению — через ближайший островок надежды в место, что мон-кай зовут Простором Коронус".

languages.text: {n}The Farseer's emerald-green eyes are filled with despair.{/n} "We had been steering Crudarach along a course prophesied by the stars themselves, until Sha'eil's tumultuous currents cast us to the edge of the Great Wound. A storm was coming, threatening to sweep Crudarach away from its path, and so the council decided on a route to safety — across the nearest islet of hope and into the place known among the mon-keigh as the Koronus Expanse."
languages.original_text: {n}Изумрудные глаза провидца полны отчаяния.{/n} "Мы вели Крударах по пути, что пророчили сами звезды, пока бурные течения Ша'эиль не забросили нас к краю Великой Раны. Буря надвигалась, грозясь смести Крударах со своего пути, и потому совет избрал путь к спасению — через ближайший островок надежды в место, что мон-кай зовут Простором Коронус".

languages.text: {n}Los ojos verde esmeralda del vidente están llenos de desesperación.{/n} «Crudarach viajaba a lo largo de una ruta profetizada por las mismas estrellas, hasta que las tumultuosas corrientes del Sha'eil nos llevaron a las inmediaciones de la Gran Herida. Se avecinaba una tempestad que amenazaba con desviar Crudarach de su rumbo, así que el consejo decidió tomar otra ruta más segura: cruzar el islote de esperanza más próximo y adentrarnos en el lugar que los mon-keigh llaman Extensión de Koronus».
languages.original_text: {n}The Farseer's emerald-green eyes are filled with despair.{/n} "We had been steering Crudarach along a course prophesied by the stars themselves, until Sha'eil's tumultuous currents cast us to the edge of the Great Wound. A storm was coming, threatening to sweep Crudarach away from its path, and so the council decided on a route to safety — across the nearest islet of hope and into the place known among the mon-keigh as the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos verde esmeralda del vidente están llenos de desesperación.{/n} «Crudarach viajaba a lo largo de una ruta profetizada por las mismas estrellas, hasta que las tumultuosas corrientes del Sha'eil nos llevaron a las inmediaciones de la Gran Herida. Se avecinaba una tempestad que amenazaba con desviar Crudarach de su rumbo, así que el consejo decidió tomar otra ruta más segura: cruzar el islote de esperanza más próximo y adentrarnos en el lugar que los mon-keigh llaman Extensión de Koronus».

languages.text: {n}先見司の翠玉の瞳は絶望に満ちている。 {/n}「我々は星々が予言した航路に沿ってクルダラを操縦していたが、シャーエイルの激流により、我々が大いなる傷の端に追いやられてしまった。来たる嵐がクルダラを道から押し流す恐れがあったため、評議会は安全なルートを選択した…最も近い希望の小島を越え、モン＝ケイの間ではコロヌス・エクスパンスとして知られる場所に入ったのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Farseer's emerald-green eyes are filled with despair.{/n} "We had been steering Crudarach along a course prophesied by the stars themselves, until Sha'eil's tumultuous currents cast us to the edge of the Great Wound. A storm was coming, threatening to sweep Crudarach away from its path, and so the council decided on a route to safety — across the nearest islet of hope and into the place known among the mon-keigh as the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: {n}先見司の翠玉の瞳は絶望に満ちている。 {/n}「我々は星々が予言した航路に沿ってクルダラを操縦していたが、シャーエイルの激流により、我々が大いなる傷の端に追いやられてしまった。来たる嵐がクルダラを道から押し流す恐れがあったため、評議会は安全なルートを選択した…最も近い希望の小島を越え、モン＝ケイの間ではコロヌス・エクスパンスとして知られる場所に入ったのだ」

languages.text: {n}先知翠绿色的眼睛里充满了绝望。{/n}“我们一直在引导克鲁达拉赫，沿着星辰本身预言的航线前进，可纱芮尔的激流缺我们推到了大裂口的边缘。一场呼啸的风暴即将来袭，要把克鲁达拉赫从航道上卷走，于是议会决定前往另一条安全的路线，穿过最近的希望之岛，进入被猴子称作‘科罗努斯扩区’的地方。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Farseer's emerald-green eyes are filled with despair.{/n} "We had been steering Crudarach along a course prophesied by the stars themselves, until Sha'eil's tumultuous currents cast us to the edge of the Great Wound. A storm was coming, threatening to sweep Crudarach away from its path, and so the council decided on a route to safety — across the nearest islet of hope and into the place known among the mon-keigh as the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: {n}先知翠绿色的眼睛里充满了绝望。{/n}“我们一直在引导克鲁达拉赫，沿着星辰本身预言的航线前进，可纱芮尔的激流缺我们推到了大裂口的边缘。一场呼啸的风暴即将来袭，要把克鲁达拉赫从航道上卷走，于是议会决定前往另一条安全的路线，穿过最近的希望之岛，进入被猴子称作‘科罗努斯扩区’的地方。”

languages.text: {n}Les yeux vert émeraude du Grand Prophète sont emplis de désespoir.{/n} « Crudarach suivait une trajectoire prophétisée par les étoiles elles-mêmes, jusqu'à ce que les tumultueux courants du Sha'eil nous envoient à la bordure de la Grande plaie. Une tempête arrivait, menaçant d'emporter Crudarach loin de sa trajectoire. Le conseil a alors décidé d'un itinéraire plus sûr. Nous devions atteindre le prochain îlot d'espoir et l'endroit connu par les mon-keigh sous le nom des Étendues de Koronus. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Farseer's emerald-green eyes are filled with despair.{/n} "We had been steering Crudarach along a course prophesied by the stars themselves, until Sha'eil's tumultuous currents cast us to the edge of the Great Wound. A storm was coming, threatening to sweep Crudarach away from its path, and so the council decided on a route to safety — across the nearest islet of hope and into the place known among the mon-keigh as the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux vert émeraude du Grand Prophète sont emplis de désespoir.{/n} « Crudarach suivait une trajectoire prophétisée par les étoiles elles-mêmes, jusqu'à ce que les tumultueux courants du Sha'eil nous envoient à la bordure de la Grande plaie. Une tempête arrivait, menaçant d'emporter Crudarach loin de sa trajectoire. Le conseil a alors décidé d'un itinéraire plus sûr. Nous devions atteindre le prochain îlot d'espoir et l'endroit connu par les mon-keigh sous le nom des Étendues de Koronus. »

languages.text: {n}Die smaragdgrünen Augen des Runenpropheten sind von Verzweiflung erfüllt.{/n} "Wir hatten Crudarach auf einen Kurs gebracht, der von den Sternen selbst prophezeit worden war, bis uns Sha'eils turbulente Strömungen nah an die Große Wunde herantrieben. Es zog ein Sturm auf und drohte, Crudarach von seinem Weg abzubringen, also beschloss der Rat, eine sichere Route einzuschlagen – zur nächstgelegenen Insel der Hoffnung und zu dem Ort, der bei den Chem-Pan-Sey als Koronus-Ausdehnung bekannt ist."
languages.original_text: {n}The Farseer's emerald-green eyes are filled with despair.{/n} "We had been steering Crudarach along a course prophesied by the stars themselves, until Sha'eil's tumultuous currents cast us to the edge of the Great Wound. A storm was coming, threatening to sweep Crudarach away from its path, and so the council decided on a route to safety — across the nearest islet of hope and into the place known among the mon-keigh as the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: Die smaragdgrünen Augen des Runenpropheten sind von Verzweiflung erfüllt.{/n} "Wir hatten Crudarach auf einen Kurs gebracht, der von den Sternen selbst prophezeit worden war, bis uns Sha'eils turbulente Strömungen nah an die Große Wunde herantrieben. Es zog ein Sturm auf und drohte, Crudarach von seinem Weg abzubringen, also beschloss der Rat, eine sichere Route einzuschlagen – zur nächstgelegenen Insel der Hoffnung und zu dem Ort, der bei den Chem-Pan-Sey als Koronus-Ausdehnung bekannt ist."

languages.text: {n}Ötesezen'in zümrüt yeşili gözleri, çaresizlikle doluyor.{/n} "Sha'eil'in çalkantılı akımları, bizi Ulu Cerh'in kıyısına fırlatana dek Crudarach'ı yıldızların kehanetlerinde gördüğümüz bir rota üzerinden götürüyorduk. Crudarach'ı yolundan savurma tehlikesi olan bir fırtına yaklaşıyordu ve konsey de güvenli bir rotaya geçmeye karar verdi. Biz de yakındaki umut vadeden adacıkları geçerek mon-keighler arasında Koronus Enginliği olarak bilinen yere geldik."
languages.original_text: {n}The Farseer's emerald-green eyes are filled with despair.{/n} "We had been steering Crudarach along a course prophesied by the stars themselves, until Sha'eil's tumultuous currents cast us to the edge of the Great Wound. A storm was coming, threatening to sweep Crudarach away from its path, and so the council decided on a route to safety — across the nearest islet of hope and into the place known among the mon-keigh as the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ötesezen'in zümrüt yeşili gözleri, çaresizlikle doluyor.{/n} "Sha'eil'in çalkantılı akımları, bizi Ulu Cerh'in kıyısına fırlatana dek Crudarach'ı yıldızların kehanetlerinde gördüğümüz bir rota üzerinden götürüyorduk. Crudarach'ı yolundan savurma tehlikesi olan bir fırtına yaklaşıyordu ve konsey de güvenli bir rotaya geçmeye karar verdi. Biz de yakındaki umut vadeden adacıkları geçerek mon-keighler arasında Koronus Enginliği olarak bilinen yere geldik."
